headline: Synchrony Partners with the Independent Animal Hospital Association (IAHA) to offer CareCredit, Spotlighting Commitment to the Nation's Independent Veterinary Hospitals
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financial services company, today announced a partnership with the Independent Animal Hospital Association (IAHA), becoming their preferred financing partner. The IAHA will offer Synchrony's CareCredit health and wellness credit card at the association's more than 500 independent animal hospitals in more than 30 states.
